## Vector4.addInPlace() method

Adds the given vector to the current Vector4.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addInPlace(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | the vector to add |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the updated Vector4.
